tool_description: Connect to ChurchApp using an API key provided by ChurchApp support.
name: ChurchApp
title: ChurchApp

api_list.name: Search Contacts

optional_parameters.name: q
optional_parameters.description: Search by Name, Address, Job, Email, Telephone or Mobile

optional_parameters.name: name
optional_parameters.description: Search by name (first, last, or both with "+" separating them, i.e. "first+last")

optional_parameters.name: p
optional_parameters.description: If using pagination, define which page of contacts to return

optional_parameters.name: per_page
optional_parameters.description: Define how many contacts should be returned per page

api_list.name: Get Contact
api_list.description: Search for a contact by their unique ID

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: If "true", this will return data for a specific contact, including any tags for the contact

optional_parameters.name: keydates
optional_parameters.description: will return data for a specific contact, including any key dates for the contact

api_list.name: Get Contacts by Tag
api_list.description: This will return data for all contacts with the tag

api_list.name: Get Key Dates by Contact
Get Tag
api_list.description: This will return data for a specific tag with the defined ID

api_list.name: Get Tag by Name
api_list.description: This will return data for a specific tag

api_list.name: Get Tags by Contact
Get all Contacts
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://nicholasjohn-churchapp-v1.p.rapidapi.com/addressbook/contacts"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "nicholasjohn-churchapp-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Tags
api_list.description: This will return tags ordered alphabetically
